RESUME_TIPS: Highlight your experience in **demand forecasting** by adding a specific project or responsibility where you successfully predicted future demand. For example, describe a time you used **historical sales data, seasonality, and marketing inputs** to accurately forecast product demand at Blackbuck, mentioning the percentage improvement in forecast accuracy.

Showcase your expertise in **inventory planning** by detailing your experience in managing **min/max levels** and **replenishment rules** for a retail environment, similar to what the job description mentions about managing inventory across stores and **FOFO franchises**. Quantify your achievements, like reducing stockouts by a certain percentage.

Elaborate on your experience with **retail analytics** and **omnichannel inventory management**. Specify how you tracked inventory across multiple channels (online and offline) and optimized stock allocation to ensure high **store fill rates**, resulting in improved customer satisfaction or sales.

Expand on your familiarity with **inventory optimization** techniques such as **ABC classification** and **EOQ**. Describe how you identified slow-moving or overstocked items and implemented strategies to reduce **aging stock**, improve **inventory turnover ratio**, and minimize losses.

Add metrics related to **forecast accuracy**, **stock out %**, and **overstock %** to your work experience at Uddan. Quantify your success in improving these KPIs, showing your direct impact on inventory health and working capital efficiency.

Include your experience with specific **inventory planning tools** or **ERP systems** such as **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce**, if applicable. If you don't have direct experience, consider gaining some exposure through online courses or personal projects, and then add it to your skills section.

Detail your experience in building and maintaining **dashboards** for **inventory health** and **store performance**. Specifically mention if you automated any **reporting** processes using **Power BI/Excel/SQL**, and how these dashboards were used for leadership and planning reviews.

Mention your experience with **replenishment & allocation**. Showcase how you monitored **stock movement**, initiated timely transfers from the **central warehouse**, and allocated **stock for new launches** and **high performing SKUs**.

Under your education section, explicitly mention the use of **data analysis** and **forecasting techniques** you learned from the Certified Business Analytics course. Add the course link to provide further credibility.

Emphasize your domain knowledge in **retail**, **jewelry**, **fashion retail**, **FMCG**, or **D2C brands** within your experience. Highlight your familiarity with the unique challenges and opportunities in these industries.

Demand Forecasting.COURSE_NAME: Demand Forecasting: The Foundation of Demand Driven Planning
Demand Forecasting.DESCRIPTION: This course teaches the essentials of demand forecasting, covering statistical methods, forecasting process, and collaborative planning.
Learn forecasting methods in supply chain management, including time series analysis and causal modeling.
A comprehensive introduction to time series forecasting methods using Python.

Inventory Planning.DESCRIPTION: Learn the fundamentals of inventory management, including inventory control, optimization, and replenishment strategies.
Gain expertise in supply chain planning, including demand planning, inventory planning, and capacity planning.
Basics of Inventory Management, Inventory Planning and Control explained.

FOFO Franchise Management.COURSE_NAME: Franchise Management: How to Franchise a Business
FOFO Franchise Management.DESCRIPTION: Learn the essentials of franchise management, from structuring a franchise system to managing franchisees.
Understand the principles of franchising, from the franchisor's perspective, including legal and financial aspects.
Step-by-step guide on how to start and manage a successful franchise business.

ABC Classification.COURSE_NAME: Inventory ABC Analysis and Pareto for Efficient Inventory Management
ABC Classification.DESCRIPTION: This course covers the ABC analysis for inventory management, helping you to prioritize items based on their value.
Understand inventory control techniques, including ABC analysis, to optimize stock levels and reduce costs.
Explanation of ABC analysis for prioritizing inventory and improving control.

EOQ.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to calculate and apply the Economic Order Quantity (EOQ) for optimal inventory management.
Learn the EOQ model for optimal inventory management in retail.
Explanation and calculation of Economic Order Quantity (EOQ).

NetSuite.DESCRIPTION: Learn the essential features of NetSuite ERP for managing finances, operations, and customer relationships.
Get foundational knowledge of NetSuite and its integration with business processes.
Free tutorials on how to use NetSuite for various business functions.

Zoho.DESCRIPTION: Master Zoho CRM and learn how to manage sales, marketing, and customer support effectively.
A comprehensive guide to Zoho CRM, covering sales, marketing, and customer service.
Tutorials on how to set up and use Zoho CRM for sales and customer relationship management.

Unicommerce.COURSE_NAME: E-commerce Inventory & Order Management with Unicommerce
Unicommerce.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use Unicommerce for inventory and order management in e-commerce.
An extensive collection of courses on Unicommerce, for order and inventory management.
A free tutorial for beginner on using Unicommerce.
